ewani karyabharayak itukarana niladharinge sankhyawa pramanathmakawa ihala damimata jathika shishyabhata balakaya piyawara gena thibena athara me wanawita ratapura pihiti balaani niyojanaya karana niladharinge sankhyawa 4,000k pamana weyi.kese wuwada rajya aarakshaka ha nagarika sanwardhana amathyanshaye lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage manga penwima yatathe jathika shishyabhata balakaya nawa mangakata yomu karannata hakiyawa labi thibena athara ehi katayuthu wenuwen nawa niladharin 50 deneku pasal guruwarun washayen bandawa ganimata thiranaya kara thibe.pasal niladharin washayen purna sudusukam sahithawa bandawa ganna kantha ha pirimi parshawaye siyalu denama wruththiyen guruwarun ho adhyapana kshethraye niyalena rajya niladharin sandaha pamanak dina 45 ka mulika hamuda puhunuwak laba wasaraka pariwasa kalayakata pasu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wisin adhakarilath niladhariyeku lesa pathkara rajaye gasat niwedanaya mangin prakashayata path karayi.garu katayuthu sewaya karamin thamange pasalata menma samastha samajayatama paladayi mehewarak itukarana mewani niladhari thanathurakata pathwima sabawinma bhagyayak wana athara ehidi hondin kapawimen sewaya karanne nam thama sewa thaththwaya usas karaganimin uparima sewayak labadiya haki paridi pahasukam sahitha pasalakata sthana maruwak laba ganime hakiyawa da pawathi.pasal guruwarayeku washayen jathika shishyabhata balakayata bandawa ganna niladharin adhikarilath niladhariyeku bawata pathwimen anathuruwa prathilabha rasakata himikam kiyana athara jathika shishyabhata balakaya, yuda hamudawa, nawika hamudawa, siwil aarakshaka balakaya, punaruththapana komasaris jenaral karyalaya ha jathika yowun senankaya yana sewawanwala sakriya sewaye yedimata awasthawa labima menma thama nilayata himi watup ha dimana saha anekuth waraprasada ema aayathanawalin labagatha hakiwima wisheshathwayaki.me karyaye di pasalwala sewaya karana gurubhawathun jathi, kula, aagam bhedayakin thorawa jathika shishyabhata balakayata bandawaganu labana athara ratata nayakayin bihikarana niyamuwan wana owun wayasa awurudu 30 ta adu mana kayika nirogithawayakin yuthuwima menma ee wenuwen awashya sudusukam sapuralana ayagen sammukha parikshana sandaha ayadumpath kandawimata jathika shishyabhata balakaya thiranaya kara atha.krida, sangitha, natum, pariganaka ha sinhala wani wishayayan hi mana nipunathawayakin hebi ayek nam shishyabhata kriyakarakam wala niyali adhikarilath niladhariyeku lesa jathiye sewaya sandaha kapawimata aaradhanaya karayi.sthri purusha depakshayenma me sandaha ayadumpath kandawana athara elambaena juni masaye 20 da wanawita wayasa awurudu 30 ta adu oonama ayekuta ayadumpath ewiya haka.
